description: Here we have a bunch of text faces waving together. This could be at a sports game where everyone is doing the wave. That’s always so much fun and if you want to show this scene, then make sure you put together a whole row of emoticons. Multiple people waving could also be a big, fond farewell to someone. ＼（＾∀＾）メ（＾∀＾）ノ ヽ(＾▽＾)人(＾▽＾)人(＾▽＾)ﾉ ヾ(⌒(_๑˘ㅂ˘๑)_ ヾ(◜▿‾ ( ´▿｀ ) ‾▿◝)ﾉ (●´Д)ﾉ”　ヾ(∀｀●) ヾ｜*￣ー￣｜*￣∇￣｜/” ヾ｜*￣ー￣｜*￣ー￣｜/”　　ヾ｜*￣∇￣*｜
title: Multiple People Waving
